title: 237: 10 Takeaways from Week 12
itunes:title: 237: 10 Takeaways from Week 12
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks share their 10 biggest takeaways from Week 12, including Rams head coach Sean McVay creating a monster in Jared Goff (:30), the wide-open NFC South (3:45), why it’s time for the 49ers to let Jimmy Garoppolo play (13:00) and why it’s not yet time to turn the keys over to Patrick Mahomes in Kansas City (19:15).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
